title: Yunus Emre: Aşkın Yolculuğu
overview: Yunus Emre: Aşkın Yolculuğu is a Turkish biographical historical television series starring Gökhan Atalay in the namesake leading role. It centers around the life of Yunus Emre, the 14th century Anatolian Sufi poet, who greatly influnced the Anatolian culture.
